oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Magnetic and transport studies in La(1-x)Ca(x)Mn(0.7)CO(0.3)O(3) (0.1 <= x <= 0.5)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: VERMA, D
NIGAM, AK
RAO, TKG
BAHADUR, D
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: colossal magnetoresistance
co
transition
system
order
fe
manganites
metal-insulator transition
cmr
spin transition
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: electrical and magnetic properties of La(1-x)Ca(x)Mn(0.7)Co(0.3)O(3) (0.1 less than or equal toxless than or equal to 0.5) have been investigated. From the magnetic measurement it is evident that high spin Co(3+) transforms to low spin Co(3+) (diamagnetic) at low temperatures which influences its magnetic and transport properties. Change in spin state of Co(3+) leads to change in the magnetic structure. The experimental resistivity data are examined using the small-polaron transport model and it finds a good theoretical fit. (C) 2003
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF MAGNETISM AND MAGNETIC MATERIALS, 271(2-3), 172-179
